"Mao Yi": "So a gentleman will follow his words and act in order to fulfill his faith." "Book of Rites. The Doctrine of the Mean: "Words and deeds, deeds and words."
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from " birds " to " widows ", " widows " are vocal symbols, which may be used to look back at the bird's head. The bamboo slips from " see " to " worst " are the original word for " Gu " for review. "Shuowen": "Gu, also look at it. Hire from the page."
humanum_full_description: 金文表示顧念、顧及，中山王方壺：「不顧大宜(義)」、「不顧逆順」。《郭店楚簡．緇衣》：「故君子顧言而行，以成其信。」《禮記．中庸》：「言顧行，行顧言。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「鳥」從「寡」，「寡」是聲符，可能以鳥的回頭張看表示回顧。竹簡從「見」從「寡」聲，當是回顧的「顧」的本字。《說文》：「顧，還視也。从頁雇聲。」
